::Zardus/DeathStorm::

Zardus lands in the Alliance base, immediately going to the control room. He 
sits down at a console, bringing up a view of the whole ship.

"Computer, locate unit DeathStorm."

With those orders, the computer shows a cross-section of the ship, a blip 
heading for the engine room.

Zardus grins. DeathStorm was very stupid to think he could possibly win this.

Zardus sets off toward the engine room, taking a different route from the one 
DeathStorm was using. While walking, he activates his comm-link.

"Nemesis," he says into it, "Please meet me at the engine room imediately. 
Arm yourself."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm walks through the corridors on his way to the engine room, 
grinning to himself about his upcoming victory.

After some thought, he had decided simply to destroy the Alliance instead of 
taking over. The others would not accept him as a leader, and he couldn't 
hope to match Zardus' leadership. He takes out a brown box from his storage 
compartment, grinning to himself. An explosing in the engine room should take 
out the ship and give him time to escape.

DeathStorm keeps walking toward the engine room.
